addDoctor(address,string,uint256,string).details: Function to add a new doctor to the system.

params.name: The name of the doctor.
params.specialty: The medical specialty of the doctor.
params.timeExperience: The number of years of experience.
params.walletAddress: The Ethereum address of the doctor.

addPatient(address,string,string,string).details: Function to add a new patient to the system.

params.preIllness: Information about the patient's pre-illness state.
params.walletAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.

constructor.details: Constructor function to set the contract deployer as the admin.

getMedicalReports(address).details: Function to retrieve all medical reports for a given patient.

params.patientAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.

returns._0: An array of MedicalReport structs representing the patient's medical reports.

writeMedicalReport(address,uint256,strin.details: Function for a doctor to write a medical report for a patient.

params.ipfsHash: The IPFS hash referencing the actual medical report.
params.patientAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.
params.reportDate: The date when the medical report was created.
params.reportNumber: The number associated with the medical report.

@title HealthcareContract
 @dev A smart contract for managing healthcare-related data on the Ethereum blockchain.
